subject: junit for JDK 1.02 version
msgSnippet: Is there any such thing? ;-) For a project that would require some java app on Mac 68030, I would need to build the app with JDK 1.0.2 and run with MRJ 1.5.1
messageBody:
Is there any such thing? ;-)

For a project that would require some java app on Mac 68030, I would
need to build the app with JDK 1.0.2 and run with MRJ 1.5.1 on MacOS
7.5.

Command line interface of junit would be enough.
(I would develop on PC and run on Mac).

Does a Junit for JDK 1.0.2 exist?
Any hope? (Before I rebuild something myself?).

Thanks!
Jean-Marc Heneman
